body_html:
@fmassa
Thanks again for the kind and helpful reply.
I agree with you, and that's the way I went down.

For future reference who stumble on this,
instead of referencing the normal random sampler,
try to have a look at how BatchSampler handles large list with yield statement to generate random numbers on the fly.

body:
@fmassa 
Thanks again for the kind and helpful reply.
I agree with you, and that's the way I went down.

For future reference who stumble on this,
instead of referencing the normal random sampler, 
try to have a look at how BatchSampler handles large list with yield statement to generate random numbers on the fly.
